title: Horn-Horn, Cracked
description: The exciting sequel to supernatural black comedy Horn-Horn, this time even darker and crazier than before! If you enjoyed the work of Arthur C. Clarke, Terry Pratchett and J.K. Rowling, you're going to love Horn-Horn, Cracked!Sixteen-year-old Cassie Gellar is excited as Horn-Horn High-High reopens its doors after its shocking destruction in the previous book. Now run by a strict company called the Meltzer Foundation, the students are forced through their biggest hurdle yet: school uniforms.Meanwhile, convicted murderer Peter Lépreux has escaped from prison and is spotted in Horn-Horn, just as a mysterious force from Danube confiscates Zag from the Gellar household.Bringing its usual dose of whacky humour, fantasy and horror to the table, Horn-Horn, Cracked is “wildly entertaining and thought-provoking."
author: A.D.T. McLellan
